script:
1). Do you live by yourself?
No, I have two roommates. 
Yes, I live with my wife.
Yes, there are four of us.
2). When will he be available?
He's away from his desk.
No, he won't.
After two o'clock. 
3). Would David Hanson be able to help us?
He cannot be able to.
No, I'm afraid he wouldn't. 
Yes, she could help.
